alert.note: Alert for Central Interior; Deltana and Tanana Flats; Denali; Eastern Alaska Range; Middle Tanana Valley; Upper Tanana Valley and the Fortymile Country; Yukon Flats and Surrounding Uplands (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 31 at 7:06PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...Next round of snow for the Interior Wednesday evening into Thursday... An upper level system will bring more snow to the Middle Tanana Valley and surrounding areas Wednesday evening into Thursday. Snowfall will be of the light and fluffy type, which may impact visibility for the commute Wednesday evening and Thursday morning, especially along the Parks Highway. Snow accumulations will not be heavy, with expected amounts of 2 to 4 inches. Please leave extra time for the commute Wednesday evening and Thursday morning, and drive slowly. For the latest forecasts go to www.weather.gov/fairbanks.
